骨力.definition: (Chinese calligraphy) vigor of brushstrokes; fortitude; toughness; spine

骨子裡.definition: beneath the surface; fundamentally; at the deepest level

骨幹.definition: diaphysis (long segment of a bone); fig. backbone

骨折.definition: to suffer a fracture; (of a bone) to break; fracture

骨料.definition: aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)

骨朵.definition: club (ancient stick-like weapon with a melon-shaped enlargement at the tip); (flower) bud

骨氣.definition: unyielding character; courageous spirit; integrity; moral backbone

骨法.definition: bone structure and physiognomy; the strength observed in brushstrokes (Chinese calligraphy)

骨灰盒.definition: box for bone ashes; funerary casket

骨燼.definition: bones and ashes; remains (after Buddhist cremation)

骨瓷.definition: bone china (fine white porcelain made from a mixture of clay and bone ash)

骨瘤.definition: osteoma (benign tumor composed of bone-like material)

骨瘦如柴.definition: as thin as a match; emaciated (idiom)

骨瘦如豺.definition: variant of 骨瘦如柴[gu3 shou4 ru2 chai2]

骨碌.definition: to roll rapidly; to spin; Taiwan pr. [gu2lu5]

骨碌碌.definition: (onom.) rolling around; spinning; also pr. [gu1lu1lu1]; Taiwan pr. [gu2lu4lu5]

骨肉.definition: blood relation; kin; one's flesh and blood

骨肉相殘.definition: close kindred slaughter one another (idiom); internecine strife

骨肉相連.definition: lit. interrelated as bones and flesh (idiom); inseparably related; closely intertwined

骨裂.definition: bone fracture; (of a bone) to fracture

骨頂雞.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian coot (Fulica atra)

骨頭.definition: bone; CL:根[gen1],塊|块[kuai4]; moral character; bitterness; Taiwan pr. [gu2 tou5]

骨頭架子.definition: skeleton; skinny person; a mere skeleton

骨髓增生異常綜合徵.pinyin: gu3 sui3 zeng1 sheng1 yi4 chang2 zong1 he2 zheng1

骨髓腔.definition: (anatomy) medullary cavity; marrow cavity of a bone

骨鯁.definition: fish bone; bone stuck in the throat; sth one feels obliged to speak out about; candid speaker

骨鯁之臣.definition: lit. fish bone of a minister (idiom); fig. person one can rely on for candid criticism

骨鯁在喉.definition: fish bone stuck in one's throat (idiom); fig. to feel obliged to speak out candidly; sth on one's mind
